root.name: Final Lap 2000
root.description: Overview Final Lap 2000 has three modes and a track editor. The following modes are: World Tour- Compete against five other racers to progress through the many tracks provided by the game.Arcade- In this mode you simply race against one other opponent, choosing whatever track you want to play on.Time Trial- For this mode you are simply attempting to obtain the fastest time for specific tracks.
